  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

## Create bmi forecast

```{r}
library(TeenGrowth)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

## Clean Data
The first step in

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
clean_data = clean_data(demo,
                        id_col_name = 'participant', 
                        age_col_name = 'age',
                        sex_col_name = 'sex',
                        ht_col_name = 'height',
                        wt_col_name = 'weight',
                        adult_ht_col_name = 'adult_height_in', 
                        ed_aoo_col_name = 'ed_aoo', 
                        ht_unit = 'in', 
                        wt_unit = 'lb')
```

## Create BMI Forecasts
```{r}
BMI_forecast <- forecast_bmi(
             data = clean_data, 
             central_value = "mean",
             ci = 95)


```

## Plot Data
```{r}
plot_eBMI(clean_data = clean_data, 
          forecast_data = BMI_forecast, 
          px = 2)
```
